thread.title_full: Perfect Fit Innovations reviewed by Moontally Sorn

author: Moontally	 Sorn
title: Moontally Sorn
text: Sleeves fit perfectly with my Pok√©mon cards, plus it has a flap where it seals it off so no dirt/dust could get inside. Completely clean look. (22-50pts), Accidentally received a pack of sleeves that were the wrong size but quickly got that issue solve once I gave them a ring. Great customer service. Will definitely purchase again in the future once I get more cards. Thanks again!
